mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tgame (game_num, game_date, game_time, game_team) VALUES (tgame_seq.nextval, #{game_date}, #{game_time}, #{game_team})
INSERT INTO grade (grade_num, game_num, title, quantity, price_week, price_weekend) VALUES (grade_seq.nextval, #{game_num}, #{title}, #{quantity}, #{price_week}, #{price_weekend})
